attributes.action: We the people of the United Kingdom reject all forms of Digital ID
attributes.additional_details: The majority of the people of the United kingdom would reject digital ID as this can be used for control and the erosion of our democratic right in the near future by governments.
attributes.background: Reject all forms of digital ID for the United Kingdom

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not introduce Digital ID cards
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
